hymn.title: For the word of God is living and operative

layout.singingstanza: For the word of God, word of God, is liv -- ing and op -- 'ra -- tive, op -- 'ra -- tive, and shar -- per than an -- y two -- edg -- ed sword, and pierc -- ing e -- ven to the di -- vid -- ing of soul and spir -- it and of joints and mar -- row, and a -- ble to dis -- cern the thoughts and in -- ten -- tions of the heart, the thoughts and in -- ten -- tions of the heart.

lyrics.stanza: For the word of God, word of God, Is living and operative, operative, And sharper than any two-edged sword, And piercing even to the Dividing of soul and spirit And of joints and marrow, And able to discern The thoughts and intentions of the heart, The thoughts and intentions of the heart.
